about_the_game:
MelanBararan - Original Soundtrack

This is the original soundtrack featuring the in-game BGM used in "MelanBararan," a game developed by Picasoft.
It includes nine tracks implemented in the game, as well as bonus tracks containing unreleased BGM from the development stage!

1. Title
2. StageSelect
3. NormalStage
4. NormalTimeRemaining
5. DesertStage
6. DesertTimeRemaining
7. FeverTime
8. LoseResult
9. WinResult
10. BonusFile

Soundtrack comes in .mp3 formats.
